parameters.name: offset.id
parameters.description: Messages ONLY starting from the specified message ID

parameters.name: offset.date
parameters.description: Messages ONLY been sent before the specified epochtime(milli).

parameters.name: group[string][string]
parameters.description: This is a request variable of the map type. The query format is "map_name[key]=value", e.g. If the map name is Age, the key type is string, and the value type is integer, the query parameter is expressed as Age["bob"]=18

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields [Q]uery to build result dataset record.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of contact to filter.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields [Q]uery to build result dataset record.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
Set of unique chat IDentifier(s).
Accept: dialog -or- member ID.

parameters.name: online
parameters.description: Dialogs ONLY that are currently [not] active( closed: ? ).

parameters.name: group[string]
parameters.description: This is a request variable of the map type. The query format is "map_name[key]=value", e.g. If the map name is Age, the key type is string, and the value type is integer, the query parameter is expressed as Age["bob"]=18

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields [Q]uery to build result dataset record.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Set of unique chat member ID.

parameters.name: online
parameters.description:
Participants ONLY who are currently [not] connected to the chat.
( left: ( 0 ? online : offline ) )

parameters.name: joined
parameters.description:
Participants ONLY who have [not] been connected to the chat.
( join: ( 0 ? [request|abandoned] : connected ) )

parameters.name: exclude.kind
parameters.description: Kind of messages to exclude from results

post.summary: CreateContactFromConversation creates new contact from the data existing in the conversation and after that links this contact to the external user.
LinkContactToClient creates connection between existing internal contact and external client.

unprocessed_close.title:
Special attribute for the closed-active chats (on fact closed but should be on active tab on the front-end)
can be true only when close reason = any("client_leave", "client_timeout", "agent_timeout", "silence_timeout")

webitel.chat.Button.Request.description:
- phone: Phone Number
 - email: Email Address
 - contact: General Form
 - location: Current Location
webitel.chat.Button.Request.title: Type of request to share contact info

left.title:
OPTIONAL. A non-zero value indicates that
the participant has left the chat. OFFLINE(!)

join.description:
OPTIONAL. A non-zero value indicates that
the participant has joined the chat.

webitel.chat.Chat.description:
The Chat info.
Alias: participant, subscriber, member, peer, leg.

date.title: Timestamp when the invitation to join the chat was sent

from.title: Chat member ID who invited to join the chat

vias.title: List of unique text gateways, mentioned in peers. [VIA]

id.description: Unique message identifier inside this chat.

date.description: Timestamp when this message was sent (published).

sender.description: Chat Sender of the message, sent on behalf of a chat (member).

edit.description: Timestamp when this message was last edited.

chats.title: List of chats mentioned in messages. [FROM]

peers.title: List of peers mentioned in messages. [FROM]

id.title: Messages ONLY starting from the specified message ID

date.description: Messages ONLY been sent before the specified epochtime(milli).

left.title:
OPTIONAL. A non-zero value indicates that
the participant has left the chat. OFFLINE(!)

join.description:
OPTIONAL. A non-zero value indicates that
the participant has joined the chat.

webitel.chat.ContactChat.description:
The Chat info.
Alias: participant, subscriber, member, peer, leg.

date.title: Timestamp when the invitation to join the chat was sent

from.title: Chat member ID who invited to join the chat

closed.title:
Timestamp when dialog was closed.
Zero value means - connected (online)
Otherwise - disconnected (offline)

closed_cause.title: Close reason if closed from the request sender perspective

kind.title: Kind of messages to exclude from results

kind.title:
Kind of the message. Custom type classifier. Optional. Default: empty.
May be used by the client UI to extend set of general message.type(s): [ text | file ]
